description: Number of bipartite graphs with 3 edges on nodes {1..n}.
references: R. P. Stanley, Enumerative Combinatorics, Cambridge, Vol. 2, 1999; see Problem 5.5.
links: Chai Wah Wu, Graphs whose normalized Laplacian matrices are separable as density matrices in quantum mechanics, arXiv preprint arXiv:1407.5663, 2014
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (7,-21,35,-35,21,-7,1).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 16 2000
